A great post from @Jack_Franklin here. It’s rich in caveats to ward of the inevitable judgements that he’s passing blanket judgements of his own. He’s not. But there’s great food for thought in this if you’re considering what the right tools for your next project might be. https://t.co/kHLqR2S5K1
